sub_title: Digital Transformation | Route to Market Innovation | Business Development | Data Driven Sales | Customer & Consumer Marketing
summary:
11 years’ experience in top-flight international sales, trade marketing & digital transformation roles to any commercial challenge. Adept at providing deep, real-world insights on the consumer, shopper and customer/trading partner based on my roles in category management & trade marketing. 

Able to embed a stronger revenue & margin-growth mindset in Sales & Marketing leaders through globally proven frameworks and education techniques. Have a track record of unlocking new decision-making powers within leadership through advanced knowledge of data science and analytics and understanding the best way of embedding digital transformations within an existing commercial organization. 

I’m a creative problem-solver who is brand-obsessed and a geek for all things tech & digital, and someone who loves pulling a team over the line, impacting through innovative storytelling.

certifications.name: GPT-4: The New GPT Release and What You Need to Know

projects.title: Heineken Champions League Final Activation 2018
projects.description:
Working alongside our Licensed Brewing & Distribution Partner - a skeleton team lead the full commercial activation of Heineken's representation in the build-up to and during the UEFA Champions League Final in Kiev in 2018. 

From volume ambition through consumer engagement & outlet-level execution to Fanzone activation, the small team collaborated across all functions to provide a world-class brand presence driving both equity scores and volume in a tough, highly-price-sensitive market.

Leadership Coach | Business Coach | Navigating Career Success, Transition, Self-Promotion, and Job Satisfaction | 15 Years of Corporate Leadership Excellence

projects.title: HEINEKEN Focus Week 2015
projects.description:
Managing the strategic direction, planning, preparation & implementation of 250+ HEINEKEN Sales & Marketing employees in a week-long New Product visibility drive in the UK On Trade. 

Coaching a team of Marketing Managers, Logistics, Sales Directors & Internal Communication Managers over the course of 6 months in preparation for the launch of 3 new HEINEKEN line extensions & a consolidated effort to increase their consumer visibility in trade.

contributors.headline: Digital Transformation | Route to Market Innovation | Business Development | Data Driven Sales | Customer & Consumer Marketing
Head of Sustainability at HEINEKEN UK

projects.title: S&NPC Star Pub Awards
projects.description:
Working in partnership with two creative design teams, UseYourLocal.com and a number of major globally-recognised sponsors including Coco-Cola Ent. & BSkyB, I managed the conception and and implementation of the S&NPC Star Pub Awards. 

The scheme has been designed to encourage employees of HEINEKEN and their annex businesses to visit outlets within the Scottish & Newcastle Pub Estate and score them on a number of different categories. 

Pubs scoring the highest across the country will be shortlisted for the national awards taking place in November. 

I am leader in the ongoing management of the entire project from implementation of internal communications and liaison with sponsors to the planning of the awards ceremony.

projects.title: KickOff Screening at FACT, Liverpool
projects.description: I co-organised the screening and Q&A of London-based writer/director Rikki Beadle-Blair. After the film was shown, members of the audience where encouraged ask questions to a panel of academics, professionals in the topics covered in the film, and the director himself. I acted as chair during the session.

projects.title: The Classroom Project, Mambucal
projects.description: Whilst volunteering in The Philippines, I set up a project to build a classroom to house brand new and refurbished computer facilities for the schoolchildren of the Parish of Murcia. Once funds had been raised, and equipment had been bought, I organised a group of local tradesmen and volunteers to help repair a derelict classroom.

contributors.headline: Digital Transformation | Route to Market Innovation | Business Development | Data Driven Sales | Customer & Consumer Marketing

profile_positions.description: Project Managed a redesign and new standardization of HEINEKEN's sales business model to deliver the sustainable value growth towards the company's ‘Evergreen 2025’ strategic ambition; this involved the introduction of 4x key pillars of transformation, focussed on Route to Consumer transformation, Digitalization of sales processes and Organizational & Capability updates. The programme was piloted in Vietnam & Mexico and affects the way of working for 32K direct & indirect Sales men & women around the world.
profile_positions.title: Business Transformation Manager - Global Sales Team

profile_positions.description: In 2019, I was 1 of 6 global talents selected as part of Heineken Global Digital Data Driven Sales team, focused on driving new ways of working and capabilities in OpCos across the world. As a result, Commercial Leaders and OpCos were empowered to make better, more informed commercial decisions leveraging data & advance analytics. To drive & embed this capability, I completed rotational Short-Term Assignments, unlocking value in Spain, the UK, Singapore & Malaysia.
profile_positions.title: Data Driven Sales Manager - Global Sales Team

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for developing the Channel Vision & Strategy of our Central European Export & Licensed ventures. Managing yearly Channel Activation plans & driving the commercial organization on portfolio & SKU approach, including price mix and price/pack strategy. 

Translating this strategy into effective execution and implementation plans in diverse and challenging markets in order to effectively influence Consumer & Shopper purchasing behaviour. Overseeing the creation of excellent point-of-sale activation and ensuring full evaluation and ROI calculations on all BTL & TTL activations in these markets before implementing the learnings. 

Trade Marketing lead for Krusovice® and Amstel® brands across Export & Duty Free markets as well as actively working on the  Heineken® and Ciders portfolio in Central & Eastern Europe, translating our  global platforms into effective and exciting local activations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Category & Trade Marketing Manager  - Europe Export & Global Duty Free

profile_positions.description:
Managing the Trade Marketing of Central & Eastern European Markets. Responsible for the development of an ongoing channel vision for each market and working with HEINEKEN's Export & Licensed Partners to execute these annual plans in line with the commercial policy. 

Responsible for translating the Heineken Global platforms into effective and exciting local activations.
profile_positions.title: Trade Marketing Manager - Europe Export & Global Duty Free

profile_positions.description: Managing the planning, implementation and execution of HEINEKEN's extensive brand portfolio around London and parts of the South. Working closely with the Sales force, Brand teams and external agencies to bring brands to life in outlet and to tie BTL activity in with ATL visibility. Managing projects across trading channels to ensure a consistent level of quality across an extremely diverse market.
profile_positions.title: Trade Activation Manager - HEINEKEN UK

profile_positions.description: Running Retail Marketing projects within Heineken's c1400-outlet leased and tennanted pub company. Foucssing on retail quality auditing and improvement, lessee support packages and internal promotion devices. Helping develop and distribute Brand-based Marketing throughout the estate.
profile_positions.title: Customer Marketing Executive - Star Pubs & Bars

profile_positions.description:
I held a variety of responsibilities from the creation of new business to bar auditing and maintenance of existing customer relations. I worked in the free-trade including leased and tenanted pubs and free houses, bars and nightclubs. 

I organised a number of events to tie in with wider Heineken activity that would help push sales of Heineken products and increase the customer’s brand awareness.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Brand Ambassador - HEINEKEN UK

profile_positions.description:
Working as Graphics Designer & Marketing Executive for Regal Gaming and Leisure (formerly Sceptre Leisure PLC), assisting the senior management team to execute the company’s marketing strategy when considering targeting a younger market.

Consulting the senior management team on the redevelopment of the company website from a design and marketing point of view.

Creating dedicated and bespoke Point of Sale material for a number of national clients as well as in house operations before sourcing means of mass-producing the designs.
profile_positions.title: Graphic Designer I DID NOT DESIGN THIS LOGO

profile_positions.description:
Working alongside the Chief Designer for the Guild of Students, helping to create informative and cultural materials for the students each year. 

Advising the student societies on the design and distribution of their own marketing and publicities material.

Leading key promotional drives at halls of residence and smaller events throughout the year to push knowledge of Guild activity in relation to students.
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager

volunteer_experiences.description:
Provided basic education to children aged between 8-18 focussing on English Language and IT skills. Raised £1500 for new computer equipment and built a new computer lab with the help of locals. This improved the basic understanding of IT with local children (Word Processing, Spreadsheets etc.) and offered them a better chance of employment when they entered the job market.

The Plan: https://youtu.be/XyZ3qp-ssKs?si=MjTCw7bPncGcPMVa
The Result: https://youtu.be/TTgUqE2yNfI?si=aA85ciV6HEiegmI1

company.name: HCPT (Hosanna House and Children's Pilgrimage Trust)

volunteer_experiences.description: Multiple weeks in Lourdes, France for the annual HCPT pilgrimage assisting Catholic youth groups with children of various mental, physical & socio-economic disadvantages. General helper, entertainer, singer, face-painter and wheelchair carrier.
